Dialogue: Are you sure that's a real spell? Well, it's not very good, is it? Of course I've only tried a few simple spells myself, and they've all worked for me. For example...  Oculus Reparo.  That's better, isn't it? Holy Cricket, you're Harry Potter. I'm Hermione Granger...and you are...?
Oh, move over!  Alohomora.  Get in.
Good. And enunciate. Wingardium Leviosa. Off you go then.
Neville, I'm really, really sorry about this... Petrificus Totalus.
Um Devil's Snare, Devil's Scare,  it's deadly fun...but will sulk in the sun! That's it! Devil's Snare hates sunlight!  Lumos Solem!
Alohomora!  Well, it was worth a try.
What did you do to your glasses? Oculus reparo.

Effect: Stops movement and actions of the target

Dialogue: Could I have your attention, please? Right. Now, today, we will be transforming animals into water goblets. Like so. One, two, three, Vera verto. Now it's your turn. Well, who would like to go first? Ah! Mr. Weasley. One, two, three. Vera verto.â
Oh, poor boy doesn't know what he's saying. Now, this won't hurt a bit. Brackium emendo!
Allow me, Professor Snape. Alarte ascendare!
Spell Name: Launch an object up into the air

Dialogue: The adventure ends here, boys. But don't fret. The world will know our story. How I was too late to save the girl. How you two tragically lost your minds at the sight of her mangled body. So, you first, Mr. Potter. Say good-bye to your memories. Obliviate!
Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima. Lumos Maxima!
So terrifying, yes, yes, yes... Luckily, a very simple charm exists to repel a boggart. Let's practice it now. Without wands, please. After me. Riddikulus!
Effect: Turns a Boggart into something amusing
Turns a Boggart into something amusing

Dialogue: Very good. A little louder and very clear. Listen: Riddikulus!
Effect: Turns a Boggart into something amusing
Turns a Boggart into something amusing
Turns a Boggart into something amusing
Turns a Boggart into something amusing
Turns a Boggart into something amusing

Dialogue: And next! Step up, step up! Wonderful, wonderful! Here! Riddikulus! Right. Sorry about that. That's enough for today. Collect your books from the back. That's the end of the lesson. Thank you! Sorry! Sorry, you can have too much of a good thing.
Effect: Turns a Boggart into something amusing

Dialogue: Can you do this? Yes. Very well. Close your eyes. Concentrate. Explore your past. Do you have a memory? Allow it to fill you up. Lose yourself within it. Then speak the incantation, Expecto Patronum.
Just do it. Expecto Patronum! Expecto Patronum!
Expelliarmus! Well, well, Sirius. Looking rather ragged, aren't we? Finally, the flesh reflects the madness within.
Expelliarmus! Vengeance is sweet. How I hoped I'd be the one to catch you.

Effect: Stops movement and actions of the target

Dialogue: Priori Incantatem. You saw your parents that night didn't you? They reappeared.
Effect: Shows the previous spells cast by a wand
Reflects spells and blocks physical forces

Dialogue: Didn't mummy ever tell you it's bad manners to eavesdrop, Potter? Petrificus Totalus!
Try Finite Incantatem.  Of course if something's gone wrong with an Atmospheric Charm --
Finite Incantatem, okay.  And if that doesn't work...?
You're lying.  And one mustn't tell lies, Dolores... Stupefy!
Protego Maxima... Finato Duri... Repello Inimicum...
Protego Maxima... Finato Duri... Repello Inimicum...
